pages.text: Compared to other modpacks, instead of limiting the player in their habbits of, for example, pressing F3 to show them their current coordinates or adding $(italic)more$() stuff through keybinds, here, most of them are rather subtle changes and additions.
Some of them are bound to already existing items, others can be toggeled in the options or re-bind to a keybind, if wanted.$(br2)This entry will list most of them.
